title: WHATRESTURANTS ARE CLOSEING IN SOUTHPORT OR ANY WHEREALSE . ALSO DUEYOU THINK SOUTHPORT EVER GET ANY MORE FAST FOOD RESTURANTS.
text:
The best way to keep track of restaurant openings and closings is to
follow Liz Biro at the Port City Foodies blog. Here's a link:
http://foodies.blogs.starnewsonline.com/author/biro/



Unfortunately we can't answer speculative questions about retail
development at MyReporter.com. If such a development is announced, it
will be reported in the StarNews and at StarNewsOnline.com.
